RumorFact.Text: Esker said I should talk to other Hearthians at the north pole camp to jog my memory.

ExploreFact.Text: <Color=#00ff43>Data Entry Restored:</Color> I detected a signal on an unknown frequency when I pointed my signalscope at a particular section of the sky. The signal is in nomaian. I'm taking it to Hal to translate.
<Color=#00ff43>Data Entry Restored:</Color> The message carried by the signal describes a Nomai experiment in another solar system. Something about stabilizing stars!

RumorFact.Text: I seem to be remembering. I think something happened at the Hourglass Twins but what?

ExploreFact.Text: <Color=#00ff43>Data Entry Restored:</Color> I found some controls for the Ash Twin Project accessible using a Nomai staff. They contain options for the quantity of information sent back in time.
<Color=#00ff43>Data Entry Restored:</Color> By reducing the amount of information sent by the Ash Twin Project, I can increase the amount of time it is sent back by!

RumorFact.Text: I remember that I sent the message to Chert, but why can't I remember other details?

ExploreFact.Text: <Color=#00ff43>Data Entry Restored:</Color> I have come up with a plan. I don't know how intact these logs will remain but I'm writing them anyways because if my plan succeeds, I will almost certainly forget what happened.

<Color=#00ff43>Data Entry Restored:</Color> I'm going to set the Ash Twin Project to send as strong a signal as I can make as far back in time as possible, warning about the sun's explosion. In order to get that extra energy, I'm not going to be able to remember that last few loops. Hopefully Chert will pick up the signal and warn the others. Maybe they can evacuate towards that Nomai signal I picked up. I hope...
